channel.title: Npc attack another Npc? Possible?
channel.description: Well I've been working on a beast of a quest and i want to make a certain npc attack another. Pretty epic eh :eek:? Well i remember that the Kahazard (i think) knights would attack the gnomes in south of ardy. You know... so there must be a way to work it. Any help would be nice.

item.title: Npc attack another Npc? Possible?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

I will not speedfeed you but you can add it in NPCHandler.java, same place wheer you make NPC’s spawn different NPC’s once dead, making NPC’s talk etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc attack another Npc? Possible?
item.dc:creator: @yermom yermom
item.description:
@yermom wrote:

[quote=“openice123, post:12, topic:286556”]Its all in the server already if you have npc combat.
Theres already a method to do damage to npcs using the update mask.
Theres already attack emotes for npcs.
You can already face npcs towards each other (It has been released).

You just have to do a few simple edits. Everyone that has done it so far has said its super easy.[/quote]

Hm. aight im pickin up wat yur puttin down. ill mess around and see if i can figure it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc attack another Npc? Possible?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I saw a code somewhere but I don’t think it works, I’ll go look it up[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 01, 2009, 07:03:54 pm[/size][hr] public int getIdForNPC(int NPCID) {
for(NPC npc : Server.npcHandler.npcs) {
if(npc == null) {
continue;
}
if(npc.npcType == NPCID) {
return npc.npcId;
}
}
return -1;
}

NPCID = The Npc’s ID, example: 0 = Hans, I think

Read full topic

item.title: Npc attack another Npc? Possible?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

Its all in the server already if you have npc combat.
Theres already a method to do damage to npcs using the update mask.
Theres already attack emotes for npcs.
You can already face npcs towards each other (It has been released).

You just have to do a few simple edits. Everyone that has done it so far has said its super easy.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc attack another Npc? Possible?
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

openice123:

Think about it as combining Player Vrs Npc and Npc vrs Player (same thing?) but removing the player part and replacing it with similar variables as the Npc attacking variables. It doesn’t sound that hard in theory tbh.

If it did work would you beable to make the NPCs only attack a certain npc, and become aggressive towards each other through a certain distance?

Read full topic
